CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(UTM_Source__c) = "Foredrag", "Lecture", IF(OR(TEXT(UTM_Source__c) = "Reference", TEXT(UTM_Source__c) = "Referral Program", NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(User_Created_Type__c)))), "Referrals & User Created", IF(AND(TEXT(UTM_Source__c) = "Facebook", TEXT(UTM_Medium__c) = "PR Leads"), "PR Leads", "Other" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Lead Segment
